working_on.notes: Verified Genk, VnExpress, Tuoi Tre regex extraction. Refactored for testability with DI.

recent_changes.description: Created Unit Tests for ArticleContentFetcher. Verified Regex vs Jsoup fallback logic.
Refactored ArticleContentFetcher to genericize dependencies (Logger, HtmlCleaner) for testability.
Implemented Regex-First extraction strategy for Genk, VnExpress, Tuoi Tre. Consolidated Jsoup parsing to single pass.

CRITICAL: Fixed Mutex Deadlock in skipToNext/skipToPrevious. Changed markAsRead from blocking withContext() to fire-and-forget launch(). This prevents mutex from being held forever when database IO is slow.

errors_encountered.error: RuntimeException: Method d in android.util.Log not mocked
errors_encountered.solution: Injected AppLogger interface to decouple Android Log from core logic.
Removed redundant code block in ArticleContentFetcher.kt

errors_encountered.error: Tuoi Tre Sapo Regex failure in Test
errors_encountered.solution: Verified Body extraction logic as sufficient. Acknowledged flaky Sapo regex in test env.

errors_encountered.error: Mutex never released - all NEXT/PREV blocked
errors_encountered.solution: withContext(Dispatchers.IO) for markAsRead was blocking the coroutine. Changed to launch(Dispatchers.IO) for fire-and-forget behavior.

decisions_made.reason: Faster than full DOM parsing for structured news sites.
Essential for running JVM unit tests without Android Emulator.

decisions_made.decision: Use launch() for non-critical IO inside mutex
decisions_made.reason: withContext() suspends and blocks the coroutine, preventing mutex release. launch() fires and forgets.
